article_title: Why Obamacare Is Still On The Legal Ropes After 4 Years

article_metadata.author: David Davenport

og.description: The Affordable Care Act (ACA) is nearly 4.5 years old, yet it seems to have spent most of its life in one courtroom after another with its legal viability still hanging in the balance.  In a report issued last summer, the National Health Law Program had tracked 89 federal court [...]
